name: Minute Men: Digger
description:
The first game released by Tiny Ant Collective, a retro arcade/PC game remake of the classic Digger.

Ideally play with a controller for the best gameplay experience, but you can also use the keyboard.

Navigate using the left analog or WASD, and plant bombs to destroy enemies with Gamepad A/KB Space.

P will pause/unpause the game.
